bad-translations.description: Wonder how game look when translations? Now know! This mod translates every line of text in the game to another language and then back to English, leading to some jumbled garbage.
bad-translations.name: Bad Translations

buy-bits-and-pieces.description: Gathering bits and pieces by recycling materials can get repetitive and annoying. This mod allows you to buy them with simoleons instead, for those of you that don't like to use cheats.
buy-bits-and-pieces.name: Buy Bits and Pieces

followers-for-fame.description: Can you really call yourself a 'Global Superstar' when you only have 12 followers on Simstagram? This mod automatically gives your sim followers whenever they gain fame.
followers-for-fame.name: Followers for Fame

language-barriers.description: A world where everyone speaks the same language is unrealistic. This mod adds new languages to the Sims universe, which introduces a unique challenge to the game.
language-barriers.name: Language Barriers

online-homework.description: Can't find your sim's notebook? Well, now you can do their homework at any computer or laptop. This mod works for children, teens, and university students.
online-homework.name: Online Homework

pack-tests.description: If you ever need to test whether your users have a particular pack installed or not, this script will allow you to do so directly in tuning - no scripting abilities required!
pack-tests.name: Pack Tests

show-sim-info.description: View all of the internal data for particular sims with an interaction. Originally by Itasan on MTS.
show-sim-info.name: Show Sim Info

simway.description: How would you like to be your own boss and set your own hours? Join Simway for just ยง500, then sell products and recruit other sims to make a profit! This mod adds MLMs to the game.
simway.name: Simway (MLM Mod)

utter-chaos.description: Saying "hello" to your neighbor? You just might burst into flames, turn into an alien, or both. This mod adds a chance for random outcomes to every action in the game.
utter-chaos.name: Utter Chaos
